short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It shrinks the Procore search box to give you more room for your favorites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Would you like more room for your Procore favorites? This extension makes the Procore Search box smaller to give them a little more breathing room.

Looking for other Procore tweaks, integrations, or any other software solutions for your construction business?
